solution_line_template: At 5 A.M., the temperature was {initial_temperature} degrees + {temp_increase_per_interval} degrees = <<{initial_temperature}+{temp_increase_per_interval}={temp_at_5am}>>{temp_at_5am} degrees.

At 9 A.M., the temperature was {temp_at_7am} degrees + {temp_increase_per_interval} degrees = <<{temp_at_7am}+{temp_increase_per_interval}={temp_at_9am}>>{temp_at_9am} degrees.
